summary: A letter from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to the Metropolitan Detention Center, transmitting discovery materials to inmate Ghislaine Maxwell in her criminal case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case (20 Cr. 330) and the inmate to whom discovery materials are being sent.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: The signatory of the letter, transmitting discovery on behalf of the U.S. Attorney's Office.

locations: Silvio J. Mollo Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC), 80 29th Street, Brooklyn, NY 11232
keyFacts: The document is dated December 18, 2020, during the pre-trial phase of Ghislaine Maxwell's prosecution.
It confirms Maxwell was incarcerated as inmate 02879-509 at the Metropolitan Detention Center in Brooklyn.
The U.S. Attorney's Office was actively providing discovery materials to the defense in case 20 Cr. 330.
Audrey Strauss was serving as the Acting U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York at this time.
